Our next load is on 11th Oct. from Umm Shaif. Please kindly give us the details of your oil product.

Hi Yan,

Greetings from Akon Energy. We are a Russian trading firm dealing in crude oil and petroleum products. We require a LOI for the crude oil. We are in position of a tanker at that time. We can export any crude. Please revert to me on this.

Sincerely,

David Brand

Thanks
David Brand
Strategic Alliance - Exxon Mobil
Deputy Head of Supply - Rosneft
+97155 175 5399

Yan,
We have a crude oil to offer on the below terms.
Product: Existed, originated from Kazak, CAS No: 64741-43-3
Quantity: 30,000 M/T
IMO III Tanker, clean, untraded
Loading Port: Port of Odessa, Ukraine
Discharging Port: Shanghai, China

# @mentions
## Setup

We have the ability to mention people with @username. For example, mentioning @taylorotwell will notify Taylor Otwell that you mentioned them.

We use Laravel notifications internally, so if someone mentioned you and has their notification settings set up, they'll be notified of the mention.

To handle mentions in your own apps, simply listen for the Event:NotificationEvent which is sent when @mentions are posted.

See the Notifications documentation for more information.
